Miscellaneous Highlights: Wanindu Hasaranga has been ruled out from the ODI series against India due to a hamstring injury
Jeffrey Vandersay will replace Hasaranga in the squad for the remaining 2 ODIs in the series
Others: The second and third ODI of the series between Sri Lanka and India will be played on the 4th and 7th August 2024 at the R. Premadasa International Cricket Stadium in Colombo
